allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit with project setup and MVP design

- Android Studio template project \(API 29+\)
- MVP design document for SlowDown app
- Core features: countdown intervention, app redirect, statistics

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:/devlopment/SlowDown" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: configure Compose, Room, DataStore dependencies

- Update libs.versions.toml with Compose, Room, DataStore, Navigation
- Add KSP plugin for Room annotation processing
- Convert MainActivity from XML/ViewBinding to Compose
- Add Material3 Compose theme \(Color, Theme, Typography\)
- Remove old XML layouts, fragments, menus, and navigation graph
- Update themes.xml to use Android Material themes \(Compose handles theming\)
- Set Java/Kotlin target to version 17, compileSdk to 35

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -Command "cd ''D:\\devlopment\\SlowDown''; git commit -m ''feat: add Application class and utility helpers

- Add SlowDownApp Application class with lazy-initialized database,
  preferences, and repository
- Add PackageUtils for app discovery and launching
- Add PermissionHelper for accessibility, overlay, and MIUI permissions
- Update AndroidManifest with required permissions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")

Bash(git -C "D:\\devlopment\\SlowDown" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(ui\): add usage warning dialogs for time limit alerts

- Create UsageWarningActivity with three dialog modes:
  - 80% warning: amber theme, shows remaining time, exit/continue options
  - 100% soft: orange theme, redirect/continue options
  - 100% strict: red theme, redirect/home options \(NO continue\)
- Update AppMonitorService to launch warning Activity
- Register UsageWarningActivity in AndroidManifest

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\devlopment\\SlowDown" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve critical issues in app list UI

- Fix switch toggle logic passing wrong state \(old vs new\)
- Remove redundant synchronous call in loadAppData
- Remove unused monitoredApps field in AppDetailViewModel

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:/devlopment/SlowDown" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(ui\): add Statistics screen with bottom navigation

- Add StatisticsViewModel for aggregating usage data \(today/weekly/monthly\)
- Create StatisticsScreen with pie chart, weekly bar chart, and per-app details
- Implement bottom navigation bar with 4 tabs \(Home, Apps, Statistics, Settings\)
- Update NavGraph to integrate Statistics route and bottom navigation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\devlopment\\SlowDown" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: optimize statistics screen composables

- Add remember to color lists to prevent recreation on recomposition
- Add coerceIn to progress bar value to ensure 0-1 range

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:/devlopment/SlowDown" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(permission\): add UsageStats permission handling

- Add hasUsageStatsPermission\(\) to check if PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS is granted
- Add openUsageStatsSettings\(\) to navigate to system settings
- Add usageStatsEnabled field to PermissionState data class
- Add UsageStats permission card to SettingsScreen
- Update DashboardViewModel to also track UsageStats permission

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
